tasks.label: � Dev Server
tasks.command: npm run dev

tasks.label: 🛑 Stop Dev Server
tasks.command: lsof -ti:3001 | xargs -r kill -9 && echo '✅ Puerto 3001 liberado' || true

tasks.label: 🧹 Clear All Caches
tasks.command: rm -rf .next node_modules/.cache tsconfig.tsbuildinfo && echo '✅ Caches limpiadas'

tasks.label: 📥 Sincronizar PROD → DEV
tasks.command: ${workspaceFolder}/scripts/sync_prod_to_dev.sh

tasks.label: ➕ Crear Nueva Migración
tasks.command: mkdir -p ${workspaceFolder}/database/migrations/development && cd ${workspaceFolder}/database/migrations/development && FILENAME=$(date +%Y%m%d_%H%M%S)_nueva_migracion.sql && echo '-- Migración: ' $FILENAME > $FILENAME && echo '-- Descripción: [DESCRIBE QUÉ HACE ESTA MIGRACIÓN]' >> $FILENAME && echo '' >> $FILENAME && echo '-- Tu SQL aquí:' >> $FILENAME && echo '' >> $FILENAME && echo '✅ Migración creada:' $FILENAME

tasks.label: 🔄 Aplicar Migraciones a DEV
tasks.command: ${workspaceFolder}/scripts/apply_migrations_dev.sh

tasks.label: ⬆️ Promover Migración (dev → tested)
tasks.command: ${workspaceFolder}/scripts/promote_migration.sh

tasks.label: 📊 Ver Estado Migraciones
tasks.command: echo '📊 DEVELOPMENT:' && ls -1 ${workspaceFolder}/database/migrations/development/*.sql 2>/dev/null | wc -l && echo '✅ TESTED:' && ls -1 ${workspaceFolder}/database/migrations/tested/*.sql 2>/dev/null | wc -l && echo '📦 APPLIED:' && ls -1 ${workspaceFolder}/database/migrations/applied/*.sql 2>/dev/null | wc -l && echo '🗄️ ARCHIVE:' && ls -1 ${workspaceFolder}/database/migrations/applied/archive/*.sql 2>/dev/null | wc -l

tasks.label: 🏗️ Build Producción
tasks.command: NODE_ENV=production npm run build && ls -lh .next/required-server-files.json 2>/dev/null || true

tasks.label: 🚀 Desplegar a PRODUCCIÓN
tasks.command: ${workspaceFolder}/scripts/deploy_to_prod.sh

tasks.label: 🔄 Reiniciar PM2 (Producción)
tasks.command: sudo -u www-data pm2 restart cuentassik-prod

tasks.label: 📊 Ver Logs PM2
tasks.command: sudo -u www-data pm2 logs cuentassik-prod --lines 50 --nostream

tasks.label: 📊 Estado PM2
tasks.command: sudo -u www-data pm2 status && echo '' && sudo -u www-data pm2 info cuentassik-prod || true

tasks.label: 🧪 Run Tests
tasks.command: npm test

tasks.label: 🔍 Lint
tasks.command: npm run lint

tasks.label: 🔍 Type Check
tasks.command: npm run typecheck

tasks.label: 📊 Estado Servicios Críticos
tasks.command: echo '📊 Estado servicios:' && sudo systemctl status apache2 mysql ssh --no-pager | grep -E '(Active:|●)' && echo '' && sudo -u www-data pm2 list && echo '' && sudo -u www-data pm2 logs cuentassik-prod --lines 15 --nostream

tasks.label: 🔐 Ver Puertos Abiertos
tasks.command: sudo netstat -tulpn | grep LISTEN

tasks.label: 📦 Espacio en Disco
tasks.command: df -h && echo '' && echo '=== Uso por directorio ===' && du -sh /var/www /home/teamspeak /home/pzakra ${workspaceFolder} 2>/dev/null

tasks.label: 🧹 Limpiar Caché (Linux)
tasks.command: rm -rf .next node_modules/.cache tsconfig.tsbuildinfo && echo '✅ Cachés limpiadas: .next/, node_modules/.cache/, tsconfig.tsbuildinfo'

tasks.label: 🔄 Reiniciar PM2 Producción
tasks.command: sudo -u www-data pm2 restart cuentassik-prod && echo '✅ PM2 reiniciado' && sleep 2 && sudo -u www-data pm2 logs cuentassik-prod --lines 20 --nostream

tasks.label: 🔄 Reiniciar Apache
tasks.command: sudo systemctl restart apache2 && echo '✅ Apache reiniciado' && sudo systemctl status apache2 --no-pager

tasks.label: 🔄 Reiniciar MySQL
tasks.command: sudo systemctl restart mysql && echo '✅ MySQL reiniciado' && sudo systemctl status mysql --no-pager

tasks.label: 🔄 Reiniciar Todos los Servicios
tasks.command:
echo '🔄 Reiniciando MySQL...' && sudo systemctl restart mysql && echo '✅ MySQL OK' && echo '🔄 Reiniciando Apache...' && sudo systemctl restart apache2 && echo '✅ Apache OK' && sleep 2 && echo '🔄 Reiniciando PM2...' && sudo -u www-data pm2 restart cuentassik-prod && echo '✅ PM2 OK' && sleep 3 && echo '
📊 Estado de servicios:' && sudo systemctl status mysql apache2 --no-pager | grep -E '(Active:|●)' && echo '
📋 Logs PM2:' && sudo -u www-data pm2 logs cuentassik-prod --lines 15 --nostream

tasks.label: 🚀 Deploy Producción (Build + Deploy + Restart)
tasks.command:
echo '🔨 Building...' && npm run build && echo '📦 Deploying...' && sudo rsync -av --delete .next/ /opt/cuentassik/prod/.next/ --exclude='cache' && sudo chown -R www-data:www-data /opt/cuentassik/prod/.next/ && echo '🔄 Restarting services...' && sudo systemctl restart apache2 && sudo -u www-data pm2 restart cuentassik-prod && sleep 3 && echo '
✅ Deploy completo!' && echo '
📋 Logs PM2:' && sudo -u www-data pm2 logs cuentassik-prod --lines 20 --nostream

tasks.label: 🧹🚀 Full Reset + Deploy (Con Caché)
tasks.command:
echo '🧹 Limpiando caché...' && rm -rf .next node_modules/.cache tsconfig.tsbuildinfo && echo '✅ Caché limpiada' && echo '🔨 Building...' && npm run build && echo '📦 Deploying...' && sudo rsync -av --delete .next/ /opt/cuentassik/prod/.next/ --exclude='cache' && sudo chown -R www-data:www-data /opt/cuentassik/prod/.next/ && echo '🔄 Restarting MySQL...' && sudo systemctl restart mysql && echo '🔄 Restarting Apache...' && sudo systemctl restart apache2 && sleep 2 && echo '🔄 Restarting PM2...' && sudo -u www-data pm2 restart cuentassik-prod && sleep 3 && echo '
✅ Full reset completo!' && echo '
📊 Estado servicios:' && sudo systemctl status mysql apache2 --no-pager | grep -E '(Active:|●)' && echo '
📋 Logs PM2:' && sudo -u www-data pm2 logs cuentassik-prod --lines 20 --nostream
